message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to you. To start the conversation, I propose a price of $1,300,000. What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but my initial offer already reflects a significant discount on the true value of this product.  I'm willing to move slightly from my previous position. How about $1,275,000?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,250,000. I hope this meets somewhere in between our positions.
